name: Plane Lens
introduction: Seeing countless different futures, joy, anger, sorrow, and joy alternate in various parallel worlds. Gemini is always observing silently, constantly searching for the mystery of the universe and the ultimate answer hidden among us.

awakening_skills.description: Attacks the shield enemy again, but the DMG dealt will not ignore the target's shield and M.RES.
Additional DMG will be triggered if the enemy is killed.
ATK+10%, CRIT+10% (Valid ONLY in Arena, Clash of Titans, Glory Arena, Clash of Guilds, Olympus Legend, Gods Twilight, Conqueror of Legends, and friends battle).
